body: This is probably the best NTR I found 8.3/10
Welp at least it's not the girl cheating with an ugly bastard
Loved the netorare here BUT unless this gonna have a sequel why leave?. That's probably the only girl that can satisfy you. Hmppf
Ayy man, this one was pretty good yo!

@Ecchinosuke you seem to be intentionally looking at it wrong. It's NTR when the story is written to put the reader into the shoes of a cuck. If the MC is winning it isn't ntr it's either netori or just cheating. NTR should only be used to specify when the mc is losing and the reader is intended to get off on the bad feelings of being a pathetic cuck. This isn't ntr, the mc isn't the girlfriend and we aren't put into her shoes. You people always act like there is something hypocritical here because ya'll use a bizarre definition of ntr. My position is consistent I do not want to go read fictional artwork about fictional characters and their fictional relationships and be put in the shoes of anything less than a winner.
Netori or reverse NTR should have hsi own tag.

So let me get this straight!
It will only be NTR if it is the guy getting cheated by his GF behind his back with a random dude with no GF, but if we take the same story and reverse the rolls it's not possible. 
You people need to make up your minds cause for you it seems NTR is the guy always getting the short end of the stick.
4k i love ntr but this setup is beyond stupid

I find that the problem in labeling this as either netorare or netori is that it doesn't feel like none of the two, at the end it just cheating. The main character is the one doing the cheating, and the tan girl, which is the "fmc", doesnt have a boyfriend or is in any relationship, and the main problem is, the girlfriend doesn't feel like an important charater at all, so, you really dont feel like its netorare at all. Of course its more close to netori, since the fmc is stealing the mc from his girlfriend, but it still feels very weak.

So this is netori damn tags shouldn't be mixed with netorare nhen tags being more confusing Jesus fuck hot doujin tho
This is netori, not netorare.
